thread.title: BRIEF-Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy Wins Bid For Urbanisation PPP Contract Worth 2.58 Bln Yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy Wins Bid For Urbanisation PPP Contract Worth 2.58 Bln Yuan

organizations.name: tunghsu azure renewable energy co ltd
brief-tunghsu azure renewable energy wins bid for urbanisation ppp

text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Tunghsu Azure Renewable Energy Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT WINS BID FOR URBANISATION PPP CONTRACT WORTH 2.58 BILLION YUAN ($405.67 million) Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2EJija6 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3599 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
